Polo (Persian:  chogn) is a team sport played on horseback. The objective 
is to score goals against an opposing team. Players score by driving a small 
white plastic or wooden ball into the opposing team's goal using a long-handled 
mallet. .... Players strike the ball with the long side of the mallet head, not the end.
